articles.title: 7 Moncton air traffic controllers to keep jobs after Nav Canada reverses decision

articles.title: Marissa Shephard pleads guilty to manslaughter, arson in brutal slaying of N.B. teen
articles.description: MONCTON, N.B. - A New Brunswick woman has pleaded guilty to manslaughter and arson in the brutal slaying of 18-year-old Baylee Wylie of Moncton.
